Nominee for the USA Basketball U-18 team as a senior ... A two-time Tucson Magnet High School Athlete of the Year ...  The 2009 State Champion in the 300-meter hurdles, 2010 state champion in the 100 and 300-meter hurdles and finished fifth in the 2010 high jump ...  Holds the high jump and 100 meter hurdles record at her school ...
